comment.body:
Sanitizer test. Dangerous content should be escaped:

![image](/url)
![image](/url "title")

[scripted link](javascript:code)

<script>
code
</script>

> [daniell](#comment_1_15hL2gR4oCSgKBbndn3MxY8Hc5xoy1vqCe): You could add a feature to add multiple versions of the posts, that detects ZeroNet language.

It could be a nice feature, but I'm not going to work on it in the near future. Your pull requests are always welcome. ;)

Now I'm working on the user profiles and next I'm going to tune the design a little bit and make the first stable release.

And I should finally translate that TODO-list in English, someday! :D

> [leftside](#comment_1_16dEowtNbV89NxPcDrAKkmnuXtiJVoVcDm): What's meaning of the items with a box checked and a strike line??Done? 

Yep, done.
